title: PK-huset
text:
PK-huset

PK-huset (formerly PK-bankens hus) is a combined office and department store building at Hamngatan and Norrlandsgatan at Norrmalm in Stockholm. Nowadays, the Nordic finance group Nordea has its Swedish branch office in the building.
summary: PK-huset is a combined office and department store building at Hamngatan and Norrlandsgatan at Norrmalm in Stockholm. Nowadays, the Nordic finance group Nordea has its Swedish branch office in the building.
